EmailTemplate.description: Inform Partner Candidate that submitted application is incomplete
EmailTemplate.name: Partner Application Denied - Incomplete Application
EmailTemplate.subject: Information Regarding your SunPower Partner Application
EmailTemplate.textOnly:
Dear {!Lead.FirstName},
The application form submitted to us was not filled out adequately enough for us to complete an evaluation.
If you would like to be reconsidered as a potential partner for the SunPower Dealer Network please go to:
http://us.sunpowercorp.com/common/forms/dealer.php
Thank you.
SunPower Customer Care Team Email: customercare@sunpowercorp.com Phone: 1-800-SUNPOWER (1800-786-7693) www.sunpowercorp.com
